document_data.name: Blackrocks
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blackrocks''' were a region of rocky wasteland north of [[Scornubel]] along the [[Trade Way]].
document_data.Geography: The Blackrocks stretched from just after [[Scornubel]]{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|286|17}} and beyond.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|349|20}} The region contained many stone formations, a few streams, some trees,{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|343-344|19}} and much scrub.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|256|15}} It was hilly.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|183|11}}
document_data.Inhabitants: Per local traders and caravaneers, the Blackrocks were abundant in [[orcs]], bandits, [[bear]]s, [[wolves]], [[leucrotta]],{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|139|9}} [[goblins]], probably [[ghouls]], and other predators.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|129|8}}
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan crossed the Blackrocks during the early leg of its trip between [[Scornubel]] and [[Waterdeep]].
